name: I Just Wanted To Eat My Cereal
name_original: I Just Wanted To Eat My Cereal
description: Carl just wanted to enjoy some good ol cereal, however the mistakes of earth have other plans for him... DEVELOPERS NOTE: Hello everyone, this is my first game I have ever created. The process was really fun to do and I hope you all enjoy it for what it is. Since this is my first game, I would greatly appreciate any feedback that you have that can make my next game better. I prefer to get feedback messaged through my Insta @spyral_art. Other than that, I hope you enjoy this short game :)
